pr_title: RM#25946 : Add leave lines configuration menu in leave management

timeline.bodyText:
onChange is also triggered when you empty a field, so here I get a NPE if I empty the leaveReason field.
You can simply use ?. to empty the name when leaveReason is emptied.
timeline.author: ale-axelor

 	</form>

timeline.message:
Add leave lines configuration menu in leave management

New menu : leaveManagement -> configuration -> all employees's leave lines
Bugfix : leaveLine's fields employee & leaveReason are now required
Add new views corresponding to the new menu
Add French & English translation for the menu title
